channel.title: X-Realms! | Where all the fun begins!
channel.description:
Welcome to the X-Realms 718/728.
Links: NOTICE: Client has been updated, make sure to download the new one! [url=http://x-realms.com/play.php]Play now - Webclient[/url] [url=http://x-realms.com/downloads.php]Play now - Downloadable Client[/url] [url=http://x-realms.com/vote/]Support us - Vote[/url] [url=http://x-realms.com/forums/]Forums - Join the Community[/url]
Completionist cape w/requirements Ganodermic & Polypore dungeons Clan chat & friends chat Money Pouch Gravestones Squeal of Fortune Farming Hunter Summoning Co-op Slayer Fight Pits Duel Arena Dominion Tower Runespan Clan Wars Castle Wars Fight Caves (63 waves) Fight Kiln (36 waves) Barrows King Black Dragon Queen Black Dragon Tormented Demons Corporal Beast Kalphite Queen Barrelchest Yk'Lagor the Thunderous (Donor boss!) Avatar of Destruction Avatar of Creation King Daggonoths Pest Queen Nomad Bork Nex
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2vvjceq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/1gfzlt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2mzw7eo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2rwuot1.png[/img]
Join the server Yourself and come see how it is, if you end up liking it, you might aswell just stay and have fun with us!
- Kevin & Tyler, owners of X-Realms.
